attributes.background: Eddie Izzard has raised millions for sport relief by running marathons,when he first started to do this he could hardly be described as an athlete,but the determination and courage to raise money for the less fortunate kept him going to achieve the fantastic thing he has.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
